invariants.description: These are the invariants that must hold true for the analyzer to pass

rules.name: No JD text as evidence source
rules.description: No 'evidence-backed strength' may cite text from the JD as the evidence source. All evidence must come from profile.projects[*].evidence_urls

rules.name: Capacity is a constraint not a gap
rules.description: 'Capacity: Part-time' must be treated as a constraint, not a responsibility gap. It should not appear in gaps as 'No evidence found for: Capacity'

rules.name: Languages must be extracted and validated
rules.description: Languages must be extracted from the Languages section and validated against profile.constraints.languages when present

rules.name: Domain fit not from generic tokens
rules.description: Domain fit must not be computed from generic tokens like 'python', 'prompt', 'japanese'. It should only use domain-specific terms like 'cosmetics', 'beauty', 'CPG', 'retail', etc.
